summary: A NUMBER OF TIMES WHEN I BRAKE ON UNEVEN ROADS, THE BRAKES ON MY 2003 PRIUS FEEL AS IF THEY AREN'T WORKING.  THEY HAVE ALWAYS CAUGHT ALMOST IMMEDIATELY, SO THAT I HAVEN'T THOUGHT OF REPORTING THE PROBLEM UNTIL THE RECENT REPORTS ON THE NEWEST PRIUS MODEL.  INCIDENT DATE IS THE MOST RECENT, EVEN THOUGH THE PROBLEM HAS BEEN THERE SINCE I BOUGHT THE CAR. *TR
